articles.title: Man snaps 280000 images to create one awesome image of the Moon - HT Tech
articles.description: The man said he used two telescopes and over 2,80,000 separate images to make the full-scale snapshot of the Moon, which is over one gigapixel in size.
articles.content: American astrophotographer Andrew McCarthy has shared an incredibly detailed image of the moon on social media. The image showcases hardened lava lakes, worm-like collapsed lava tubes, permanently sh… [+1879 chars]
